thread.title: Biggest Driver of Cleaner-Car Rules Is California, not Washington
thread.title_full: Biggest Driver of Cleaner-Car Rules Is California, not Washington - WSJ

author: Mike Spector
title: Biggest Driver of Cleaner-Car Rules Is California, not Washington
text:
Ford Motor Co. Chief Executive Mark Fields used a recent White House breakfast with President Donald Trump to argue for relaxing U.S. car-emissions standards.

But Mr. Fields and other auto executives need to travel 2,700 miles west of Washington to find the government officials who are pushing them the most on environmental regulations. When it comes to forcing auto makers to build cleaner cars, California is in the driverâ€™s...
